definition: to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: Seek out one and suitable for the way of Chengdu urban tourism development finally.
sentences.chinese: 最終探尋一條適合成都市城市旅遊發展之路。

sentences.english: Spiritual exploration was a prominent theme in the creation of fictions in the 1940s.
sentences.chinese: 精神探尋是40年代小說創作的突出主題。

sentences.english: Instead seek inspiration from those before you and the world around you.
sentences.chinese: 用前人的創造和你身邊的東西取代苦苦探尋靈感。

sentences.english: Those are the questions many non-Japanese will be asking.
sentences.chinese: 那些都是很多非日本人要探尋的問題。

sentences.english: I think mainly when taking a disability from the eight-legged essay in the examination system to explore.
sentences.chinese: 我以爲主要當從八股文取士的科舉制度中去探尋。

sentences.english: Objective To find a way for finer lower face re-contouring.
sentences.chinese: 目的爲探尋更精細的下面部輪廓整形方法。

sentences.english: It provides theoretical basis for exploring the objectivity of difficult cases.
sentences.chinese: 這爲探尋疑難案件的客觀性提供了理論依據。

sentences.english: Experience the city's grungier side by exploring this region which is refreshingly down to earth.
sentences.chinese: 通過探尋此地完完全全的真實面來體驗城市的骯髒面。

sentences.english: Dancing with wolf is a new way for wild fashion.
sentences.chinese: 與狼共舞，探尋野性的誘惑。

sentences.english: First, they were seekers of the truth.
sentences.chinese: 首先，他們是真理的探尋者。

sentences.english: For Lovely eys, Seek out the good in people.
sentences.chinese: 想擁有迷人的雙眸，請多探尋別人的優點。

sentences.english: With the broke-up of ecological crisis worldwide, mankind begins to search for solutions.
sentences.chinese: 全球生態危機的爆發，人類開始探尋和尋求解決之道。

sentences.english: From various Chinese musical instruments, people can find out the root of ancient Chinese national culture.
sentences.chinese: 從金石絲竹中，可探尋到中國古老民族的文化之根。

sentences.english: Christopher Columbus's voyages inspired other European powers to seek out the new world as well.
sentences.chinese: 哥倫布的航行激發了其它歐洲列強探尋新世界的慾望。

sentences.english: Looking for European culture without taking a trans-Atlantic flight?
sentences.chinese: 想要探尋歐洲文化但又不想飛越大西洋？

sentences.english: I was most interested in your article on water divining .
sentences.chinese: 我對你寫的關於探尋水源的文章很感興趣。

definition: to have a taste of/to realize/to appreciate
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
to look for/to seek/to find fault
to own exclusively/unique to/specific/there is only
to interpret/to comment and explain/to annotate/to perform (i.e. interpret a theatrical role)/to decode/interpretation/annotation
to excavate/to explore/(fig.) to unearth/to tap into
